resources.string: Are you sure to retire from this game? Your current hiscore will be saved and your game will be restarted from Wave 1.

[Enter here how you break Sq, and provide as much detail as possible so that we can fix it promptly, thank you.]

 This App uses Google Analytics to track how you use this app (i.e. Telemetry data), such that developers can make this app better. It includes: 
 - Access of game functions 
 - Your game progress and statistics 
 No personally identifible information will be collected. Read about them at http://www.google.com/analytics/
Do not track how I use the app.
